name: Santoshi Maa Trust
briefDescription: Animal Protection: Protection of CowsShelter for old people / neglected parents: Free breakfast, free launch & dinner, medical care, spiritual activities and Yoga Training. As on date due to insufficient of funds only serving 5 old couples.Medical care for Poor : Providing relief to the poor and advancing any other object of general public utility. Providing financial assistance to the deserving persons for medical treatment, in medical institutions. Welfare Program: Conducting public welfare programs like blood donation etc. Two camps has been conducted as on date.Spiritual Activity: Promoting universal harmony and peace by conducting pujas, homas, and other spiritual activities to propagate the message of Santoshi Maa.
